channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: What Just Happened in Venezuela? And What Comes Next?
item.description: What is the future of Venezuela? Is there a chance for a transition to democracy? Will the United States be able to work with a protégé of Maduro to help govern Venezuela? CSIS experts discussed the aftermath of the U.S. strike on Venezuela, addressing these questions and more.

item.title: The Maduro Raid: A Military Victory with No Viable Endgame
item.description: The capture of Maduro and his wife was brilliantly executed, but Maduro’s officials remain in charge. The administration’s plans to work through these officials and ignore the opposition will likely fail, requiring additional air and missile strikes.

item.title: A Partial Look Ahead
item.description: This week, Bill Reinsch looks ahead at three high-profile trade events that will anchor global trade in 2026.

item.title: Saudi Arabia’s Mohammed bin Salman Got a Lot from Trump. What Did the United States Get?
item.description: Saudi Arabia seems to be the “net winner” after MBS’s recent trip to Washington, D.C.
